attributes.action: approach HM The Queen to approve of bars to the BURMA STAR
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Burma Star and/or the Pacific Star can not be issued together.Those members of the armed forces who fought at Imphal, Kohims, with the Chindits and those who raided coastal and rivers facilities, have not been specifically recognised, in my view they should have had a special medal, notwithstanding this bars for the categories mentioned could be issued.
